metadata.title: CVE-2021-32286 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in hcxtools through 6.1.6. A global-buffer-overflow exists in the function pcapngoptionwalk located in hcxpcapngtool.c. It allows an attacker to cause code Execution.

criterions.comment: hcxtools package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
